name: sonar-buildbreaker-vsts
description: These tasks help automate bumping version numbers and changing package names at build time.

scripts.postinstall: cd extensions/sonarcloud/tasks/buildbreaker && npm install && cd ../../../sonarqube/tasks/buildbreaker && npm install
scripts.pack: tfx extension create --manifest-globs extensions/sonarcloud/vss-extension.json && tfx extension create --manifest-globs extensions/sonarqube/vss-extension.json
